In 1994 he was the sole director and shareholder of Non Solo Web Srl which represents one of the first businesses established in Italy with specific expertise in the Internet and web oriented application development sector. In 1996 he was a founding partner of Flashnet S.p.A. (in â€˜96 / â€˜97 third ISP in Italy for customer numbers and turnover) where he served as Director of Operations. In 1998 he became a member of the Management Board and a director at Cybernet SpA (TELCO operating in 12 countries) where he was appointed General Manager for Italy.

In 2000 he became a Director at Edisontel SpA (TELCO Edison Group) where he participated in the start-up of Network & Processes Management where he went on to cover several management positions in the Information Technology, Marketing and Operations departments.

In 2004 he joined Eutelia S.p.A. (previously called Edisontel) as Director of Operations & Assurance where he later took over the same position in the subsidiary companies Getronics, Bull and Noicom.

From 2006 to 2007 he managed the development operations in the Middle East, where he participated in the preparation of business plans and technical documentation for the Fixed Network Operator tenders and assigning of frequencies for Wimax access networks in Bahrain, Saudi Arabia and Qatar.

Since November 2007 he has been Chief Operation Officer at TheBlogTV.
